com.ephesoft.dcma.mail.service

Interface MailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailServiceImpl

    public interface MailService
    This service provides APIs for sending emails.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    MailServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mailOnError(java.lang.String subject, javax.mail.Message previousMailContent, java.lang.String batchClassName, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String mailTemplatePath)
      Sends an error notification mail upon failure in Ephesoft mail service.
      void mailOnWorkflowError(BatchInstance batchInstance, java.lang.Exception exception, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String mailTemplatePath, java.lang.String activeModule)
      Sends an error notification for a batch that went into error via mail.
      void sendMailWithPreviousMailContent(MailMetaData mailMetaData, java.lang.String text, javax.mail.Message previousMailMessage)
      This method sends email for given metadata, text and content from previous mail.
      void sendTextMail(MailMetaData mailmetadata, java.lang.String text)
      This method sends email for given metadata and text.
      void sendTextMailWithClasspathTemplate(MailMetaData mailmetadata, java.lang.String templateLocation, MailContentModel model)
      This method sends email for given metadata, template and model.
      void sendTextMailWithClasspathTemplate(MailMetaData mailmetadata, java.lang.String templateLocation, MailContentModel model, javax.mail.Message previousMailMessage)
      This method sends email for given metadata, template, model and mailMessage object.This method particularly used to send mail with content from previous mail.

      • mailOnError

        void mailOnError(java.lang.String subject,
               javax.mail.Message previousMailContent,
               java.lang.String batchClassName,
               java.lang.String userName,
               java.lang.String mailTemplatePath)
                 throws DCMAApplicationException
        Sends an error notification mail upon failure in Ephesoft mail service.

        subject - String Mail subject
        previousMailContent - String message object from previous mail
        batchClassName - String
        userName - String
        mailTemplatePath - String

      • mailOnWorkflowError

        void mailOnWorkflowError(BatchInstance batchInstance,
                       java.lang.Exception exception,
                       java.lang.String subject,
                       java.lang.String mailTemplatePath,
                       java.lang.String activeModule)
                         throws DCMAApplicationException
        Sends an error notification for a batch that went into error via mail.
        Parameters:

        exception - Exception
        subject - String
        mailTemplatePath - String
        activeModule - String Last active module of error batch.
